name: .WBD File Extension
summary: Learn about .WBD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Picture file used by Webshots Desktop Connect, a program used for sharing, organizing, and viewing pictures; contains a picture image stored in a proprietary format; used by Webshots to help users organize their pictures.

content: NOTE: Webshots Desktop Connect was formerly known as Webshots Desktop and was owned by AG Interactive before being acquired by Threefold Photos in 2012.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
